message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor. It's a fair starting point, considering I'm the one making the first offer. What do you think?

Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic - due to inflation, holding out hurts you more than it hurts me. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor.  This reflects the time value of money in this game.
Bob, let's be reasonable. We're both losing money with each round. I propose a 50/50 split. It's the fairest way to divide the remaining value.
